release.body:
## What's Changed
* Allow amphp/postgres to provide an existing connection by @cspray in https://github.com/cspray/database-test-case/pull/16


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/cspray/database-test-case/compare/0.2.1...0.3.0

issue.title: The `PostAnalysisObserver` should provide access to the analysis options used to create the definition
issue.body: This will require adjusting the API of an existing interface and will have to be completed in a major version upgrade.

issue.title: The `PreAnalysisObserver` should provide access to the analysis options that will be used
issue.body: This will require adjusting the API of an existing interface and will have to be completed in a major version upgrade.

issue.title: Bootstrap and configuration should allow source directories to be profile aware

milestone.title: v2.3 Release
milestone.description: A focus on improving caching and other miscellaneous quality of life improvements.

issue.body: A list of profiles for each source or scan directory should be added to the Configuration. The directory assigned the profile would only be scanned if the provided profile is active. If no profiles has been provided then the directory always gets scanned.

comment.body: I'm not sure what the reasoning for this was but I no longer believe this is valid and we should not support this.
